title: Everyone Loves You When You're Dead: Journeys into Fame and Madness
description: You can tell a lot about somebody in a minute. If you choose the right minute. Here are 228 of them. Join Neil Strauss, "The Mike Tyson of interviewers," (Dave Pirner, Soul Asylum), as he And many, many more awkward moments and accidental adventures with the world’s number one stars in Everyone Love You When You’re Dead .
author: Neil Strauss
